verses.verse: It is not expedient <S%G4851><s%> for me doubtless <S%G1211><s%> to glory. <S%G2744><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to visions <S%G3701><s%> and revelations <S%G602><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

I knew <S%G1492><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> above <S%G4253><s%> fourteen <S%G1180><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> ago, <S%G4253><s%> (whether <S%G1535><s%> in the body, <S%G4983><s%> I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> tell; <S%G1492><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> out of the body, <S%G4983><s%> I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> tell: <S%G1492><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> knows; <S%G1492><s%>) such <S%G5108><s%> an one caught <S%G726><s%> up to the third <S%G5154><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And I knew <S%G1492><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> (whether <S%G1535><s%> in the body, <S%G4983><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> out of the body, <S%G4983><s%> I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> tell: <S%G1492><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> knows; <S%G1492><s%>)

How that he was caught <S%G726><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> paradise, <S%G3857><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> unspeakable <S%G731><s%> words, <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> it is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for a man <S%G444><s%> to utter. <S%G2980><s%>
Of such <S%G5108><s%> an one will I glory: <S%G2744><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> of myself <S%G1683><s%> I will not glory, <S%G2744><s%> but in my <S%G3450><s%> infirmities. <S%G769><s%>

For though <S%G1437><s%> I would desire <S%G2309><s%> to glory, <S%G2744><s%> I shall not be a fool; <S%G878><s%> for I will say <S%G2046><s%> the truth: <S%G225><s%> but now I forbear, <S%G5339><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man should think <S%G3049><s%> of me above <S%G5228><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> he sees <S%G991><s%> me to be, or <S%G2228><s%> that he hears <S%G191><s%> of me.

And lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should be exalted <S%G5229><s%> above measure through the abundance <S%G5236><s%> of the revelations, <S%G602><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> to me a thorn <S%G4647><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> the messenger <S%G32><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%> to buffet <S%G2852><s%> me, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should be exalted <S%G5229><s%> above measure.
For this <S%G5127><s%> thing I sought <S%G3870><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> thrice, <S%G5151><s%> that it might depart <S%G868><s%> from me.

And he said <S%G2046><s%> to me, My grace <S%G5485><s%> is sufficient <S%G714><s%> for you: for my strength <S%G1411><s%> is made <S%G5048><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%> in weakness. <S%G769><s%> Most <S%G2236><s%> gladly <S%G2236><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> will I rather <S%G3123><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in my infirmities, <S%G769><s%> that the power <S%G1411><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> may rest <S%G1981><s%> on me.

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I take pleasure <S%G2106><s%> in infirmities, <S%G769><s%> in reproaches, <S%G5196><s%> in necessities, <S%G318><s%> in persecutions, <S%G1375><s%> in distresses <S%G4730><s%> for Christ's <S%G5547><s%> sake: for when <S%G3752><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> weak, <S%G770><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> I strong. <S%G1415><s%>

I am become <S%G1096><s%> a fool <S%G878><s%> in glorying; <S%G2744><s%> you have compelled <S%G315><s%> me: for I ought <S%G3784><s%> to have been commended <S%G4921><s%> of you: for in nothing <S%G3762><s%> am I behind <S%G5302><s%> the very <S%G3029><s%> most chief <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3029><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> I be nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

Truly <S%G3303><s%> the signs <S%G4592><s%> of an apostle <S%G652><s%> were worked <S%G2716><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you in all <S%G3956><s%> patience, <S%G5281><s%> in signs, <S%G4592><s%> and wonders, <S%G5059><s%> and mighty <S%G1411><s%> deeds. <S%G1411><s%>

For what <S%G5101><s%> is it wherein <S%G3757><s%> you were inferior <S%G2274><s%> to other <S%G3062><s%> churches, <S%G1577><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> it be that I myself was not burdensome <S%G2655><s%> to you? forgive <S%G5483><s%> me this <S%G5026><s%> wrong. <S%G93><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> time I am ready <S%G2093><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you; and I will not be burdensome <S%G2655><s%> to you: for I seek <S%G2212><s%> not your's <S%G5216><s%>but you: for the children <S%G5043><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> not to lay <S%G2343><s%> up for the parents, <S%G1118><s%> but the parents <S%G1118><s%> for the children. <S%G5043><s%>

And I will very <S%G2236><s%> gladly <S%G2236><s%> spend <S%G1159><s%> and be spent <S%G1550><s%> for you; though <S%G1499><s%> the more <S%G4056><s%> abundantly <S%G4056><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> you, the less <S%G2276><s%> I be loved. <S%G25><s%>
But be it so, I did not burden <S%G2599><s%> you: nevertheless, <S%G235><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> crafty, <S%G3835><s%> I caught <S%G2983><s%> you with guile. <S%G1388><s%>
Did I make <S%G4122><s%> a gain <S%G4122><s%> of you by any <S%G5100><s%> of them whom <S%G3739><s%> I sent <S%G649><s%> to you?

I desired <S%G3870><s%> Titus, <S%G5103><s%> and with him I sent <S%G4882><s%> a brother. <S%G80><s%> Did Titus <S%G5103><s%> make <S%G4122><s%> a gain <S%G4122><s%> of you? walked <S%G4043><s%> we not in the same <S%G846><s%> spirit? <S%G4151><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%> we not in the same <S%G846><s%> steps? <S%G2487><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> you that we excuse <S%G626><s%> ourselves to you? we speak <S%G2980><s%> before <S%G2714><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in Christ: <S%G5547><s%> but we do all <S%G3956><s%> things, dearly beloved, <S%G27><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> edifying. <S%G3619><s%>

For I fear, <S%G5399><s%> lest, <S%G3381><s%> when I come, <S%G2064><s%> I shall not find <S%G2147><s%> you such <S%G3634><s%> as I would, <S%G2309><s%> and that I shall be found <S%G2147><s%> to you such <S%G3634><s%> as you would <S%G2309><s%> not: lest <S%G3381><s%> there be debates, <S%G2054><s%> contentions, <S%G2205><s%> wraths, <S%G2372><s%> strifes, <S%G2052><s%> backbitings, <S%G2636><s%> whisperings, <S%G5587><s%> arrogance, <S%G5450><s%> tumults: <S%G181><s%>

And lest, <S%G3361><s%> when I come <S%G2064><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> my God <S%G2316><s%> will humble <S%G5013><s%> me among <S%G4314><s%> you, and that I shall mourn <S%G3996><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> have sinned <S%G4258><s%> already, <S%G4258><s%> and have not repented <S%G3340><s%> of the uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and fornication <S%G4202><s%> and lasciviousness <S%G766><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have committed. <S%G4238><s%>
